channel.title: Edge pk 2 -- Big Project. [Last topic Update 14-04-2010]
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt]Edge-pk 2[/size] [size=16pt]You dare to cross the line?®[/size]
Source Base: Delta Cleaned v2 + I cleaned myself so it has NOTHING Client Base: Delta Cleaned v2. note: red: Not started and orange is Under Construction and ofcourse Green = Finished
[size=18pt]Project leaders[/size] - Me & **** (name comming soon don't got permission to post his name yet :S)
[size=16pt]Intro[/size] Let's keep it short, i am coding for like 5/6 years in java script for now, also for my school i have to work in javascript, when i told them i am a private server coder they want to see more of it. so hello guys meet my FREAKIN awesome homework. [/center] [size=18pt]Features[/size]
[list] [li][size=16pt]Combat Skills & combat 0%[/size]
[ul][li]Magic 0% [list][li]Magic on players 0% [list][li]Magic Follwoing 0%[/li] [li]Correct Timers 0%[/li] [li]Correct Emotes & GFX 0%[/li][/list][/li] [li]Magic on NPC's 0% [list][li]Magic Follwoing 0%[/li] [li]Correct Timers 0%[/li] [li]Correct Emotes & GFX 0%[/li][/list][/li][/list][/li] [li]Range 0% [list][li]Range Following 0%[/li] [li]Range Attacking 0%[/li] [li]Range Projectiles & pull back emote(s) 0%[/li] [li]Correct timers 0%[/li][/list] [/li] [li]Hitpoints 0%[/li] [li]Strength 0%[/li] [li]Attack 0%[/li] [li]Prayer 0%[/li] [li]Defence 0%[/li][/ul] [/li] [li][size=16pt]Handlers ect 0%[/size]
[ul][li]Log-in Protocol 0%[/li] [li]Log Out Handler 0%[/li] [li]NPC Handler 0%[/li] [li]PlayerHandler 0%[/li] [li]Trading 0%[/li] [li]Loading map data 0%[/li] [li]Loading Objects & Other customs 0%[/li][/ul] [/li] [li][size=16pt]Other Skills 0%[/size]
[ul][li]RuneCrafting 0%[/li] [li]Agility 0%[/li] [li]Herblore 0%[/li] [li]Thieving 0%[/li] [li]Crafting 0%[/li] [li]Fletching 0%[/li] [li]Slayer 0%[/li] [li]Mining 0%[/li] [li]Smithing 0%[/li] [li]Fishing 0%[/li] [li]Cooking 0%[/li] [li]Firemaking 0%[/li] [li]Woodcutting 0%[/li] [li]Farming 0%[/li][/ul]
[/li] [li][size=16pt]Minigames 0%[/size]
[ul][li]Duel arena 0%[/li] [li]Fight Pits 0%[/li] [li]Fight cave 0%[/li] [li]Fun pk 0%[/li] [li]PVP Area 0%[/li] [li]Pest Control 0%[/li] [li]Clan Wars 0%[/li][/ul]
--more details ect comming soon i got to sleep now.

item.dc:creator: @claunchii claunchii
item.description:
@claunchii wrote:

[quote=“edge®, post:15, topic:336730”][quote author=Berky-Scape link=topic=433141.msg3181363#msg3181363 date=1271342798]

i aint a fool, www.youtube.com search stanford university and learn java V-easy =D
and i srrsly code that long. and you should stop acting so big your just a kid that can’t even work with vbulletin. i asked you to make a bulletin forum, you went to google “make a free forum” and used it. no dude, that easy you won’t become staff
so stop flaming at me koolvin.

@ontopic

Media is comming soon, currently taking screenshots
[/quote]I know for a fact that you haven’t been coding that long, and I made that forum from phpBB3 and revised it completely to add ranks and administrator/mod crowns and such. Regardless, you know nothing of Java, you asked me to make something for you, then when I did, you stopped replying to any of my messages. I guess you were too busy working in “JavaScript”.

Let me reiterate myself: You are not any older than 13, you have not been coding Java for 5 years, you know nothing of the language you try to code in, you learned your skills from youtube? And last but not least, you are a joke.

I lol’d at that lol, last but not least
But cmon you’re a mean dumbass.

thanks berky =D finaly someone who understands me :p[/quote]

Uhm he definately shouldn’t… you dont evan know how to put a date in the title your a fucking moron… you can’t code for shit im guessing as after everything you say u have a fucking smiley face which obviously means your not being serious so im guessing you haven’t entered puberty come back here when your balls have dropped mate.

oh btw its 04/14/2010 dumbass

Read full topic

item.title: Edge pk 2 -- Big Project. [Last topic Update 14-04-2010]
item.dc:creator: @Koolvin Koolvin
item.description:
@Koolvin wrote:

[quote=“edge®, post:10, topic:336730”][quote author=DemisePking link=topic=433141.msg3180621#msg3180621 date=1271272544]

If you are in a class that requires you to use one language, yet allows another language as homework, youre not old enough to have been coding for 5 years. JavaScript is a hard language to teach in a class, as its repetitive and not vast enough, I’d know, I’m JS certified.

It seems like you don’t even know tge name of the language you say you have 5 years of experience in… JavaScript and Java are completely different… You must be like 12.

Other than that bit of BS, habe fun with this project that I guess I’m no longer involved with.

dude, your such a noob can’t say anything else about you. I’m 16 years old.
and you don’t make voids, boleans ect in “java” you make them in “Javascript”. Java is just the program which shows the game in this case, but mainly it just loads the javascript.

NOTE: tbh i think your the noob. your grammar “Habe” and cool “Vast”… are you 10?

Thanks for proving your 12

^^^^
Scared cause this will pwn all your servers? HAHAHA!!

Thanks for proving your 10.
[/quote]
let me guess, next will be 8? :o srrsly?

Noob. gtfo my topic please =D[/quote]You are seriously an idiot if you think JavaScript is what you code in. You code in Java Programming Language. Sorry about my spelling errors: ‘tge’ and ‘habe’, was typing on an iPod touch. This server is a joke obviously if its owner doesn’t know the absolute FIRST thing about coding in Java.

EDIT: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/JavaScript
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Java_(programming_language)

Learn a little bit, ok?

Read full topic

[size=18pt]Project leaders[/size]

Let’s keep it short, i am coding for like 5/6 years in java script for now, also for my school i have to work in javascript, when i told them i am a private server coder they want to see more of it. so hello guys meet my FREAKIN awesome homework.
